meanings.definition: To change the gearing of (a vehicle or machine) to suit a different speed or power range.
meanings.sent1: He decided to regearing his bike for better uphill performance.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic will regearing the car to improve its acceleration.
meanings.sent3: The bicycle was regearing itself to conquer the steep hill.
meanings.sent4: She felt like regearing her life to find a new direction.
meanings.sent5: The company is regearing its strategy to adapt to the changing market.
